desc: Looking for Pretzel snacks that are savory, sweet, salty, tangy, satisfying and irresistible? With over 46 gourmet pretzel snack flavors we have something for every pretzel lover. Treat yourself or give a gourmet gift to someone you love. Baked in the US. Shipped worldwide.

layout.text: Savory and Sweet. Salty and Tangy. Chef Crafted. Micro Batches.
